args.info: Identifies the address where the goods must be shipped.

args.name: dueDate
args.info: Date when the payment of the transaction is due.

args.name: shipDate
args.info: Date for delivery of goods or services.

args.name: globalTaxCalculation
args.info: Method in which tax is applied. Allowed values are: TaxExcluded, TaxInclusive, and NotApplicable.

args.name: totalAmt
args.info: Indicates the total amount of the transaction. This includes the total of all the charges, allowances, and taxes.

args.name: applyTaxAfterDiscount
args.info: If false or null, calculate the sales tax first, and then apply the discount. If true, subtract the discount first and then calculate the sales tax.

args.name: printStatus
args.info: Printing status of the invoice. Valid values: NotSet, NeedToPrint, PrintComplete .

args.name: emailStatus
args.info: Email status of the invoice. Valid values: NotSet, NeedToSend, EmailSent

args.name: billEmail
args.info: Identifies the e-mail address where the invoice is sent.

args.name: expirationDate
args.info: Date by which estimate must be accepted before invalidation.

args.name: acceptedBy
args.info: Name of customer who accepted the estimate.

args.name: transactionLocationType
args.info: The account location. Valid values include: WithinFrance, FranceOverseas, OutsideFranceWithEU, OutsideEU.For France locales, only.
